resources.string: The Library ID or password you entered is incorrect.

Do you wish to continue with borrowing this book?
Your borrow request has been posted. We will notify you of any changes in your request.
To stay informed about the status of your borrow requests, please make sure to turn on notifications in Virtual Library Assistant.
You have no record of book borrowing requests.
Book has no available copy for borrowing at the moment. Click \"Notify Me\" to get notified when a copy becomes available.
We will notify you when book becomes available.

Introducing the new mobile library application for Sultan Kudarat State University - Isulan Campus! This application is designed specifically for students and faculty members to make it easier for them to access and borrow books from the university library using their mobile devices. With this application, users can easily browse through the library's extensive collection of books and other resources. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to search for books by author, title, or subject matter.

The Virtual Library Assistant (VLA) Mobile Application is designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that all users can easily access and use it. In addition to its extensive collection of books, the mobile library application also provides users with access to a range of other resources. The application also sends push notifications to users to remind them about due dates and book availability.

Overall, the new mobile library application for Sultan Kudarat State University - Isulan Campus is an essential tool for students and faculty members who are looking for an easy and convenient way to access the university library's resources. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, this application is sure to be a hit with all users.
